body.name: BABY JOY Lightweight Stroller, Compact Travel Stroller, Infant Stroller w/Adjustable Backrest & Canopy, Cup Holder, Storage Basket, 5-Point Harness, Easy Fold, Umbrella Stroller for Toddler, Pink
features: A Real Lightweight Stroller: The lightweight is not a slogan. After folding the stroller, one finger could hold it to stand. And it will surely become your favorite "get around town" accessory. Young mother could easily carry it when holding baby in the arm.

High Quality Finish: Even though it is a lightweight stroller, it is constructed strongly with heavy-duty Aluminum frame which can be used for a long period time for your baby from little infant to an older one. You can fold it without much effort when you want to store it.

Adjustable Canopy: The proof UV canopy is large and could be adjustable. Thus this function could block your little ones from harmful UV, and won't that hurt their eyes. Also, this part could be stretched out and folded back, which could be adjusted by needing.

Lockable Wheels & 5-Point Harness: 2 lockable wheels can be much safer to those do not have locks. Mother or father could stop the stroller before off the hands to make sure that everything is safe. 5-point harness is also designed for safety, which gives the baby comfortable ride and enjoyable sense.

Large Enough Storage: The mesh basket under the baby seat could be large storage for parents. Thus daddy and mom could be effortless to bring the needed outside. Also the cup holder design helps parents to bring drinks or baby bottles with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for your money.
reviews.reviewText: I did my homework before buying this stroller and have been completely satisfied with my purchase. We have a traditional jogging stroller that is far too heavy and cumbersome to deal with in the everyday world. My in laws bought us a more manageable (and cheaper) umbrella stroller, but my husband and I are both over 6 feet tall and it was almost impossible for us to use bc it was so short. Plus, it had no storage or cup holders. This stroller fit the bill perfectly. It’s comfortable for our tall frames, has adequate storage, lightweight and fits perfectly in our compact car. The harness is extremely easy to fasten and unfasten . And the added bonus is the cup holder, which is designed for a normal plastic water bottle.The only issue I could see other parents having would be the lack of recline for naps. The seat is very upright and doesn’t adjust at all. It isn’t an issue for us at all because my daughter will only nap in her crib and car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and quite sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it in February of 2020 for my now 5 year old. So far after 2 years of usage it has held up pretty good. So good that one day my daughter wanted my oldest son that’s about 5’11 and 186lbs to get on it and play with her which he did. He climbs in it pretty often to play with his little sister and surprising not only does he fit relatively comfortable it also supports his weight just fine. Just for fun I’ve included a pic of my daughter playing with him trying to buckle him up which obviously didn’t reach and the other of my son casually sitting on the stroller. When my son sent me those pics one day when he was babysitting her I totally expected to get home to a broken stroller but I did not. I’m not saying I recommend this but, even after all that abuse its still holding strong and, now that my daughter is getting older and doesn’t really use it as a stroller as much I don’t mind if they want to keep play around with it like that anymore and if it ends up breaking at least I know I truly got my money out of it no doubt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight easy to use and light
reviews.reviewText: I was pleased East to handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Love this stroller. Folds nicely and quickly. Seems sturdy and quite functional. My only complaint would be the seat is quite small, as in not wide at all. If your child has a larger behind, it would be difficult for them to sit comfortably or even get the straps clicked. We ordered the green colour and it is definitely teal not green (which I personally prefer).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stroller for my newborn, not realizing it was going to be so large! After a good laugh at my tiny baby in this big kid sized stroller I still love it considering the quality and the price. My little fella will be enjoying this until he's at least 10! 😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coche muy bueno para andar en cualquier lado
reviews.reviewText: El coche para niño está muy bien la calidad y la comidas de cargarlo y guardarlo ocupa menos espacio el problema que le veo son los cinturones cuando lo abrochan es como muy justo y mi hijo tiene 2 años y es delgado pero me gusta si se duerme está cómodo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this “umbrella stroller
reviews.reviewText: I love this “umbrella stroller!” It’s cute, easy to collapse, folds away easily, but opens up as a full sized stroller for my infant. My son is only 5 months & fits comfortably in this firm, sturdy, reliable stroller. I ordered it because my jogger stroller needed a wheel replacement. I received this one right away and was amazed at how easy it was to assemble & go! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great & sturdy and easy to maneuver. Loved that the wheels turned 360 easily. We took it out of the country and it was perfect for traveling. We checked it at the gate with no problems.My son was comfortable and the lay back feature came in handy as he was able to take a nap with no problems.Overall great buy!
